Equippable.Name: Flashlight
Equippable.Description: It's an old flashlight, hopefully there are enough batteries around.

Equippable.Name: Mirror Shard
Equippable.Description: A mirror shard. It's reflective and sharp.

Equippable.Name: Pistol
Equippable.Description: Old and reliable. It's been a long time since I've shot one of these.

Equippable.Name: Gas Mask
Equippable.Description: The straps are broken, I'll have to hold it.

Equippable.Name: Flare Gun
Equippable.Description: I can defend myself using its light.

Equippable.Name: Lure Pill
Equippable.Description: Monsters seem to like it. Maybe I should try.

Equippable.Name: Radio
Equippable.Description: Looks custom-made, no idea how it works.

Item.Description: It's a key for the hallway door.

Item.Description: The barrel piece of a pistol.

Item.Name: Pistol Slide
Item.Description: The slide piece of a pistol.

Item.Name: Elevator Button
Item.Description: Probably for the 1st floor.

Item.Name: Tape - Desmond
Item.Description: A white cassette tape. Did I record this? I must have...

Item.Description: A purple cassette tape of my recorded sessions with Virginia.

Item.Description: A yellow cassette tape of my recorded sessions with Allen.

Item.Description: A red cassette tape of my recorded sessions with Max.

Item.Name: Tape - Lucas
Item.Description: A green cassette tape of my recorded sessions with Lucas.

Item.Name: Tape - Rainbow
Item.Description: I can't tell its color. This doesn't seem right.

Item.Description: It's a coin with the Homa-Mart logo on it.

Item.Name: Virginia's Key
Item.Description: I found it in her apartment.

Item.Description: For the locked room in my apartment.

Item.Description: It's a coin with the Homa-Mart logo on it.

Item.Description: It's a large electrical fuse.

Item.Description: The words "Maintenance East Wing" are written on it.

Item.Name: West Wing Key
Item.Description: The words "Maintenance West Wing" are written on it.

Item.Name: Ignition Key
Item.Description: I wonder what vehicle this belongs to.

Item.Name: Locker Key
Item.Description: Belongs to Dave.

Item.Name: Freezer Key
Item.Description: Better get out of here quick!

Item.Name: Punch Card
Item.Description: Someone is running late.

Item.Name: Mom Doll
Item.Description: It's her mom.

Item.Name: Dad Doll
Item.Description: It's her dad.

Item.Name: Brother Doll
Item.Description: It's her brother.

Item.Name: Daughter Doll
Item.Description: It's her.

Item.Description: It's a red block with the letter D on it.

Item.Description: It's a blue block with the letter E on it.

Item.Description: It's a green block with the letter A on it.

Item.Description: It's a yellow block with the letter T on it.

Item.Name: H Block
Item.Description: It's a purple block with the letter H on it.

Item.Name: Pen And Sticky Notes
Item.Description: It's a bunch of sticky notes and a pen, no idea what to do with it.

Item.Name: The Light
Item.Description: I have to restore it.

Item.Name: Fuse
Item.Description: It's a large electrical fuse.

Item.Name: Oil Can
Item.Description: It still has some oil left in it.

Item.Name: Lighthouse Courtyard Key
Item.Description: It's the key to the backside of the lighthouse.

Item.Name: Crank Wheel
Item.Description: An old crank wheel, I can probably connect it somewhere.

Item.Name: Crane Gate Key
Item.Description: I can use this key to access the wharf crane.

Item.Name: TV Key
Item.Description: It feels statickey.

Item.Name: Clock Key
Item.Description: No time to think about it.

Item.Name: Buoy Key
Item.Description: I'm not even sure how I grabbed it.

Item.Name: Hangar Key
Item.Description: Now to figure out how to get there.

Item.Name: Screwdriver
Item.Description: I can probably screw around with it.

Item.Name: Shinitzu Chip - 1V
Item.Description: A multi-purpose chip, fits a specific slot.

Item.Description: A multi-purpose chip, fits a specific slot.

Item.Description: A multi-purpose chip, fits a specific slot.

Item.Name: Key Card
Item.Description: A key card, it has the name Rosemary on it.

Item.Name: Incinerator Room Key
Item.Description: Might be a way to the bottom floor.

Item.Name: Empty Pill Jar
Item.Description: The label says "experimental".

Item.Name: Triptocybin mushroom extract "Ricordea"
Item.Description: It's a vial with glowing blue liquid.

Item.Name: Bo'lepo pheromone mix
Item.Description: It's a vial with glowing purple liquid.

Item.Name: Triptocybin mushroom extract "Reekus"
Item.Description: It's a vial with glowing green liquid.

Item.Name: Valve
Item.Description: From its base it looks reusable.

Item.Name: Sewer Door Key
Item.Description: It's got smudge all over it.

Item.Name: Old Key
Item.Description: Reminds me of a key I had once.

Item.Name: Restroom Key
Item.Description: Are there even any bathrooms around?

Item.Name: My office key
Item.Description: What the hell is it doing here?

Item.Name: Ride Ticket
Item.Description: It's a ticket for the cable car ride, oh boy!

Item.Name: Cliff Key
Item.Description: I can use this to open a shortcut to the forest.

Item.Name: Keychain Key A
Item.Description: I took it off the keychain in the visitor center.

Item.Name: Keychain Key B
Item.Description: I took it off the keychain in the visitor center.

Item.Name: Keychain Key C
Item.Description: I took it off the keychain in the visitor center.

Item.Name: Medusa Medallion
Item.Description: She seems familiar.

Item.Name: Icarus Medallion
Item.Description: From the bottom of the pit.

Item.Name: Minotaur Medallion
Item.Description: Lost in his own maze.

Item.Name: Cyclops Medallion
Item.Description: A one eyed giant.

Item.Name: Vinyl - Rosemary
Item.Description: A blue vinyl.

Item.Name: Tape - Watcher
Item.Description: I was helping her overcome her fear of being looked at.

Item.Name: Tape - Shade
Item.Description: I was helping him overcome his fear of the dark.

Item.Name: Tape - Bull
Item.Description: I was helping him overcome his anger.

Item.Name: Tape - Flash
Item.Description: I believe him.

Item.Name: Tape - Rainbow
Item.Description: I have to defeat him.
